body.name: RHM Karaoke Machine for Live Streaming with Remote Control,HD Stereo Sound with 10 Sound Effects,Support for Extra Microphone/Guitar,8 Hours Playtime,6 LED Lights,Bluetooth/TWS/USB/TF/AUX for Party
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 14 hrs 3 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 14 hrs 3 mins
features: ♪【ENJOY YOUR LIVE STREAMING】Let's start your live streaming journey with RHM karaoke machine. You can connect your device via Bluetooth or AUX-in to the speaker, and even can also connect your guitar for accompaniment during live broadcasting. Also, there have 10 sound effects and 4 voice change to hot your live atmosphere and you can remote control it. The karaoke machine for adults provides loud and crystal-clear sound, reaching a maximum volume of ≥ 71 dB, ensuring an exceptional experience.

♪【SUPPORT for EXTRA MICROPHNE /GUITAR】There is two 6.3mm input on the operation panel of the karaoke equipment, which works for guitars and wired dynamic microphone input. Additionally, it boasts an additional port specifically designed to accommodate 3.5mm wired microphones. The thoughtful design provides a convenient setup for you to play and sing together. Also, there are multiple EQ modes, KTV modes, and mic effects such as male and female to choose the sound to your liking.

♪【DYNAMIC LIGHTS EFFECT】The portable pa system is equipped with six color modes of colorful disco lights dancing with the rhythm when play the Music. The colorful LED lights and wonderful music can povide the most romantic and karaoke party environment for you.

♪【HD STEREO SOUND SPEAKER 】RHM portable speaker equipped with stereo sound and bass speaker can provide high-performance optimized sound and full-range stereo sound reproduction; built-in 5.25” subwoofer and 2” tweeter which can amplify your voice/play the radio /stream songs and it does not distort the audio even at higher volumes; It can be used as a live boardcast/karaoke system, music player, microphone speaker and PA system, you can enjoy strong, loud, and transparent bass and treble.

♪【LONG-LASTING RECHARGEABLE BATTERY & TWS MODE】RHM portable karaoke machine for adults built with 6000mAh high-capacity rechargeable battery that you can play for up to 6 to 8 hours after full charge. It built in Bluetooth 5.0 chip means you can easily connect your devices without any hassle and it can provide a more stable transmission and longer distance.The karaoke machine has TWS mode, when pairing two same RHM models, the stereo sound will be synchronized and surround you by 2 channels.

♪【MULTIFUNCTION & PORTABLE SPEAKER 】The portable karaoke speaker supports a micro TF card, Flash USB, REC, and AUX-in which can work with most devices such as PC,Phones,iPad and TV etc; It's size very nice and we gave you an extra detachable shoulder strap that you can easily take it to anywhere.(NOTE: If you have any problem or just not satisfied with this item, please kindly contact us before returning;we promise to provide professional assistance to ensure your purchase is safeguarded.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Let's Play Live Streaming Remote Control & TWS Mode
Function Button Details Wireless Microphone Mic Effect 10 Kinds of Sound Effects
Previous page Next page 1 Multifunctional Play 2 Perfect Gift for You 3 Package Informtaion

Can we use a USB to play karaoke music? Definitely! The karaoke supports a micro TF card, Flash USB, REC, and AUX-in as well as via the Bluetooth enabled device. The microphone need batteries? Or are chargeable? The battery of the karaoke machine is rechargeable. The wireless microphone requires 2pcs AA batteries, which are not included. Does it come with a remote control? Yes, this machine has a remote control or you can also long press the button of the operation panel to get different audio effect. Could I purchase the wired microphone to add to this karaoke machine? Yes, the karaoke machine has two MIC IN sockets, one supports a 6.3 mm wired dynamic microphone input, the one supports a 3.5 mm wired condenser microphone input. Additionally, you can connect your guitar to our karaoke machine. How to start a live broadcast? Connect the WHITE TRRS cable to your device, and the other end to the webcast jack of the speaker; Turn on the microphone or connect the wired microphone. Choose the live streaming platform(TikTok, Facebook, Youtube, Instagram..) for a live-stream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to use. Big sound in a small package.
reviews.reviewText: The RM-K111 was very easy to set up and use. When I turned it on, it immediately went into Bluetooth mode and it was easy for my iPhone to find and connect to. The wireless mic connected automatically - seamless connection. Just picking up this unit, you can feel a some weight to speakers, quality sound, rich tone and solid bass - filled my room with sound, no problem. Simple interface on top to adjust the mic volume, treble, bass and echo. Tons of other features. You can even plug your guitar into the back for solo gigs. It comes with a strap and can run on batteries for portability. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Karaoke Machine for the price!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Absolutely blown away by the RHM K111 Karaoke Machine! This gem is a party essential—lightweight and easily portable with an impressive built-in battery that lasts up to 6-8 hours wirelessly.The versatility is unmatched; I stream endless karaoke tracks from YouTube via various devices or connect through TWS, USB, TF card, or AUX-in. Adding an extra mic or guitar is a breeze. The HD Stereo Sound with 10 effects, along with customizable volume, echo, bass, and treble adjustments, elevates every sing-along session. The 6 LED lighting modes syncing to the music's rhythm add an extra layer of fun. It also comes with a remote control!And let's talk about value—the price tag around $100 makes this the best bang-for-buck karaoke machine out there. A must-have for any gathering!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my mother for an early christmas present and she absolutely loves it! The sound is fantastic, nice and loud too. Very simple to use. Would definitely recommend for anybody looking for a portable karaoke machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little mighty great for party!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Finally found a handy karaoke for the kids! It has voice changer that they will love, you can plug instruments too! Plus the microphone 🎤 is so good! Being a family that loves music this handy thing is a must buy 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I got one and had to buy another
reviews.reviewText: I had a bumpboxx that I paid close to $500 for. I had it since 2020 & it could do almost everything (including karaoke) but it started acting up on the Bluetooth mode and then the speakers, so I desperately needed a replacement. I always listen to loud music, I love singing loud too and I needed something that was similar to my bumpboxx, affordable and maybe even better. I did research on different karaoke machines from Amazon , I looked at many reviews. I came across this system and my first thought was about how small it was and how loud it probably wouldn’t go. I seen there was only 8 reviews but they was all good reviews so I decided to make a wish, take a chance, make a change and breakaway with my purchase… I don’t regret it… It is so loud and clear, just marvelous, the mic was better than the one I had from a $500 purchase and the system lasted like 5 hours of me playing loud music and it still had juice when I was done… I was so impressed that I thought of buying another one and tbh with a promotion code of $40 off the original price you can’t go wrong… I mean the system is worth 100 bucks so even without the promo code I probably would of bought another one regardless just because of my satisfaction. I would highly recommend if you’re on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up and use. Very high quality.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the RHM Streaming Microphone and I must say, it has exceeded my expectations! I have both their K666 and K222 so wasn’t surprised. This one is smaller and portable. The audio quality is crystal clear, making my voice sound professional and crisp during streams and recordings. I like all of the sound effects. The Bluetooth connectivity is seamless, and the long battery life is a game-changer. Like the other machines, I always appreciate how sturdy the microphone feels. It was incredibly easy to set up and integrate with my existing equipment. I’ve used it for streaming and karaoke and haven’t had any issues. Looking forward to see how it works for podcasts. If you’re looking for a reliable, high-quality microphone for any audio-related activities, this is the one to go for!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of Fun
reviews.reviewText: We had a great time with this karaoke machine, it's just what the kids need. They can sing their favorite songs and have loads of fun. It's easy to set up, and the sound quality is great. Family night was a hit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great Karaoke machine. We got this for our grandson for Christmas and he has had loads of fun with it,and so have others. It's very easy to use and sounds really good. It connects fast to bluetooth. Highly recommend.
